snippet: After plugging our information into the Economic Policy Institute’s budget calculator, I was stunned. The rent estimate was half what we pay, the grocery stipend looked like a typo, and the child-care cost was a fantasy.
abstract: After plugging our information into the Economic Policy Institute’s budget calculator, I was stunned. The rent estimate was half what we pay, the grocery stipend looked like a typo, and the child-care cost was a fantasy.

headline.main: The Price of Urban Family Living
